languages.text: Когда у существа остается 5% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, оно атакует цель на соседней клетке, нанося на 100% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, а затем погибает.
languages.original_text: When {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop down to 5%, it makes its last attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the nearest target and dies.

traits.locale_text: Когда у существа остается 5% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, оно атакует ближайшую цель, нанося на 100% больше урона, а затем погибает.
Когда у существа остается 5% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, оно атакует ближайшую цель, нанося на 100% больше урона, а затем погибает.

languages.text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop to 5%, it makes a final attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an adjacent enemy and dies.
languages.original_text: Когда у существа остается 5% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, оно атакует цель на соседней клетке, нанося на 100% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, а затем погибает.

traits.locale_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop to 5%, it makes a final attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an adjacent enemy and dies.
When the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop to 5%, it makes a final attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an adjacent enemy and dies.
When {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop down to 5%, it makes its last attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the nearest target and dies.

languages.text: 当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至5%以下时，会在临死前对最近的敌人进行最后一击，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%，之后死亡。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop to 5%, it makes a final attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an adjacent enemy and dies.

traits.locale_text: 当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至5%以下时，会在临死前对最近的敌人进行最后一击，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%，之后死亡。

languages.text: この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力が5%になると、隣接するターゲットに最終攻撃をして+100%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えて死ぬ。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop to 5%, it makes a final attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an adjacent enemy and dies.

traits.locale_text: この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力が5%になると、隣接するターゲットに最終攻撃をして+100%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えて死ぬ。

languages.text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan al 5 %, lanza un ataque final que inflige un +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo adyacente y después muere.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop to 5%, it makes a final attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an adjacent enemy and dies.

traits.locale_text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan al 5 %, lanza un ataque final que inflige un +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo adyacente y después muere.

languages.text: Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur auf 5 %, fügt sie Feinden auf angrenzenden Feldern mit einem letzten Angriff +100 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu und stirbt.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop to 5%, it makes a final attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an adjacent enemy and dies.

traits.locale_text: Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur auf 5 %, fügt sie Feinden auf angrenzenden Feldern mit einem letzten Angriff +100 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu und stirbt.

languages.text: Lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de cette créature tombe à 5 %, elle lance une dernière attaque et inflige +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi adjacent avant de succomber.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop to 5%, it makes a final attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an adjacent enemy and dies.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de cette créature tombe à 5 %, elle lance une dernière attaque et inflige +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi adjacent avant de succomber.

languages.text: When {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop down to 5%, it makes its last attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the adjacent enemy and dies.
languages.translation_comment:
Глава IV. Локация QuarryWorld.
Уникальная фича друкари-мандрагор. По достижении 5% ХП триггерит атаку мечом по всем целям вокруг мандрагоры, после чего убивает ее.

traits.locale_text: When {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop down to 5%, it makes its last attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the adjacent enemy and dies.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %5'in altına düştüğünde bitişiğindeki bir düşmana son bir saldırı gerçekleştirip +%100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve ölür.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of this creature drop to 5%, it makes a final attack dealing +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an adjacent enemy and dies.
